title: I have technical writing experience for 3 years, how can I switch to RPA? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’ll be in a good position with your technical writing background. I would recommend pursuing as many of the free courses that are available so you can be familiar with a wider variety of platforms. Despite RPA being largely codeless, you’ll be at a disadvantage if you don’t have basic coding background - especially in python/c# and some .net skills. These opportunities are a good place to start.
